author: Wayne Collins
method: Place all the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with a handful of ice and shake hard.     Strain the cocktail into a coupette glass, garnish with an orange twist and serve.
ingredients: 50ml/2fl oz cognac,  25ml/1fl oz cointreau,  25ml/1fl oz lemon juice,  1 tsp sugar syrup,  twist of orange peel
